algorithm_technique: Dynamic programming with XOR properties and frequency counting for segments.
problem_summary_simple: Minimize changes in an array so XOR of all segments of size k is zero.
problem_summary_technical: Uses DP on XOR sums of segments, considering two cases: elements not in original segments and elements within segments.
key_insights: The problem can be broken down into k independent subproblems based on indices modulo k.
The core idea is to find the most frequent XOR sum within each group of k elements and minimize changes.
Two DP approaches are considered: one for when all elements are changed, and one for when some elements are kept.
